alerts.apiError: Oops! It seems that an error has occurred on our side, please try again later.

alerts.added: Great! The video has been added successfully.
alerts.empty: Oops! It seems you left the URL blank.
alerts.invalid: Oops! It seems the URL is not valid.
alerts.exist: Oops! This video is already in the album, please try another.
alerts.nonExist: Oops! It seems the video does not exist.

delete.body: Are you sure you want to delete this video?

alerts.deleted: Done! The video has been deleted from the album.
